name.ja: <ruby>漆<rt>しっ</rt></ruby><ruby>黒<rt>こく</rt></ruby>の<ruby>太<rt>たい</rt></ruby><ruby>陽<rt>よう</rt></ruby>

text.en: If a face-up monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can gain LP equal to their total original ATK. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned face-up from your GY: You can target 1 of them; it gains 1000 ATK. If a Spell/Trap(s) is discarded from your hand to your GY: You can target 1 of them; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ebon Sun" once per turn.
